term.title: aerogel

item.text: Gel comprised of a microporous solid in which the dispersed phase is a gas.

notes.item: Microporous silica, microporous glass and zeolites are common examples of aerogels.

sources.item: PAC, 2007, 79, 1801. 'Definitions of terms relating to the structure and processing of sols, gels, networks, and inorganic-organic hybrid materials (IUPAC Recommendations 2007)' on page 1806 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac200779101801)
